Rebel group in Indonesia's Papua to release kidnapped New Zealand pilotA rebel group in Indonesia's Papua said on Wednesday it will release New Zealand pilot, Philip Mehrtens, who has been held hostage in the remote eastern region for a year. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 07:03:02 GMT AQJFEIPT6VLF7GQBGZO2JFGGLA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/rebel-group-indonesias-papua-release-kidnapped-new-zealand-pilot-2024-02-07/Reuters世界亚太地区
Stranded Australian livestock set to disembark ship after Red Sea turn-backAround 15,500 sheep and cattle aboard a ship that turned back from the Red Sea due to the risk of attack off Yemen will disembark in Australia but likely be put on another vessel in the coming weeks and exported, a farm group said. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 06:38:54 GMT GUZIQMUT6NMFRL3S6WJRXPRAII https://www.reuters.com/world/stranded-australian-livestock-set-disembark-ship-after-red-sea-turn-back-2024-02-07/Reuters世界
From jail, Pakistan's Imran Khan asks supporters to wait by poll stations after voteJailed former Pakistani premier Imran Khan urged his supporters on Wednesday to wait outside polling booths after casting their votes, as rival political parties held large rallies to mark the end of the election campaign period. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 06:32:59 GMT MZQADQ46RZI4BI4JQOEMK4BBKU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/jail-pakistans-imran-khan-asks-supporters-wait-by-poll-stations-after-vote-2024-02-07/Charlotte Greenfield, Asif Shahzad世界亚太地区
Philippines to boost military presence in islands facing TaiwanThe Philippines' defence chief has ordered the military to boost the number of troops stationed at the northernmost islands near Taiwan to fortify Manila's territorial defence capabilities. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 06:26:53 GMT 34HFQYKRDNIWND7SALHAYMGUNM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-boost-military-presence-islands-faceing-taiwan-2024-02-07/Reuters世界亚太地区
Jailed Malaysian ex-PM Najib considering new request for full pardonJailed former Malaysia Prime Minister Najib Razak is considering filing a new petition for a full pardon, his lawyer said on Wednesday, less than a week after a special panel agreed to halve his jail sentence. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 06:06:52 GMT YNSKDPO2BZI6DLT5HPRNOOEFSA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/jailed-malaysian-ex-pm-najib-considering-new-request-full-pardon-lawyer-2024-02-07/Danial Azhar, Patrick Lee世界亚太地区
China opens Antarctic station south of Australia, New ZealandChina on Wednesday inaugurated its Ross Sea scientific research station, the official Xinhua news agency reported, starting operations in an outpost in a part of the Antarctic due south of Australia and New Zealand for the first time. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 06:04:03 GMT CVOAMI7UVNJOLALPU7WIW7EJCA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-opens-antarctic-station-south-australia-new-zealand-2024-02-07/Reuters世界中国
PNG assures Australia on security ties as leader Marape arrives on visitPapua New Guinea Prime Minister James Marape arrived in Canberra on Wednesday, where he will address the national parliament a day later, on a visit that seeks to assure Australia of close security and historical ties even as PNG boosts trade with China. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 05:51:27 GMT NUQ5M2P7LVM4TFQVTX2IVCHBDA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/png-assures-australia-security-ties-leader-marape-arrives-visit-2024-02-07/Reuters世界亚太地区
Lufthansa strike hits air travel as German disruption mountsGround staff at German airline Lufthansa walked out at major airports on Wednesday, raising the pressure in wage talks and piling misery on travellers in Europe's biggest economy already hit by strikes on railways and public transport. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 05:48:44 GMT SDJMMV6HPBPQHPCBP4WNFC2IWQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/lufthansa-strike-hits-air-travel-german-disruption-mounts-2024-02-07/Reuters世界欧洲
Russia launches missile attack on Ukrainian cities - Ukraine's air forceRussia launched several waves of missile strikes on Kyiv and other Ukrainian cities during Wednesday morning rush hours, Ukrainian officials said. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 05:25:25 GMT WMZETPE4A5NNLDTCK4JF2B4COM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-launches-missile-attack-kyiv-other-ukrainian-cities-ukraines-air-force-2024-02-07/Olena Harmash, Pavel Polityuk世界欧洲
Landslide in southern Philippines buries two buses, injures 11A landslide triggered by heavy rains in a southern Philippine province buried two buses, injuring at least 11 people, disaster officials said on Wednesday. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 03:21:05 GMT RTNWSCYPQFNZDB7GT7EEQWBYAA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/landslide-southern-philippines-buries-two-buses-injures-11-2024-02-07/Reuters世界亚太地区
Japan Airlines crash: Air traffic controllers call for 'significant' staff increaseA labour union representing air traffic controllers in Japan has called for a "significant increase" in staff to improve the safety of operations at airports in the wake of a deadly crash at Tokyo's Haneda airport last month. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 03:12:39 GMT 5EDQI6VB2JMN3OHA5JT4O4NNV4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japan-airlines-crash-air-traffic-controllers-call-significant-staff-increase-2024-02-07/Reuters世界亚太地区
